website_summaries.verdict: This cooler is large and easy to pull around, but may not be your best bet for extended vacation use.
pros: Made of polyethylene, with Ultratherm insulation
Features a reinforced tow handle that easily telescopes and locks
Has a drainage spout on the bottom
Features include 4 cup holders and molded side scoop handles
cons: Some buyers report that this option arrives with a broken handle
The top is hollow, and is not for sitting
Some claim that an overall lack of insulation means that ice doesn't last as long with this cooler

website_summaries.verdict: Perfect for anyone who needs to regularly transport a lot of cold drinks.
pros: Features a lightweight wheeled design with a long handle for pulling
Has four drink holders on the lid
A recessed drain plug helps empty melted ice
cons: The handle seems flimsy when it is loaded full

website_summaries.verdict: 60 quarts of cooling capabilities at a fraction of the cost.
pros: Ultra-therm insulation keeps drinks cool and ice frozen
Telescopic handle expands for comfortable transportation
Durable wheel material works on all terrain
Great for camping or the beach
4 cupholders are built into the top
cons: Not designed to hold enough weight to make it a suitable seat

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler for the price. Start with cold items, keep it out of the sun, and it will hold ice for 3 or 4 days. I know that Yeti and other brands have "expedition" caliber coolers, but they are very expensive. This cooler strikes an excellent balance between price and quality. I have had one for several years, and I bought a second because the first was so good.
customer_reviews.author: Jim

customer_reviews.title: Five Stars
customer_reviews.text: Super light and super practical! It’s awsome! Great price and it gets delivered to my door :)
customer_reviews.author: Gnzlzfamily

customer_reviews.title: ... with a wheel in my car to load/unload grocery easy. This is on sale at a good price ...
customer_reviews.text: I want to keep a cooler with a wheel in my car to load/unload grocery easy. This is on sale at a good price so I bought it. The cooler is bigger than I thought and works really well like I wanted. I can now go shopping ice cream without have to run home fast before it melts.
customer_reviews.author: Titi

customer_reviews.title: Igloo Roller roll me away
customer_reviews.text: Love it. Filled with 2 cases of canned soda, ice everything stayed cold overnight no leaks. Little spout at the bottom to drain water. Handle and wheels very convenient to drag around. Very sturdy will use again and again. Thank-you Igloo and Amazon :)
customer_reviews.author: Double A

customer_reviews.title: Great Price, Big Value
customer_reviews.text: Really huge cooler. ha ha I purchased this cooler for a camping trip. It can store more than enough for a weekend in the woods. I most love how the top doubles as a drink holder. The wheels and functionality of this cooler are perfect. For such a great price, you can't go wrong.
customer_reviews.author: Dottie O

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: I highly recommend this cooler. First thing I noticed it is much bigger than it looks in the picture. Lots of room and still compact. Handle slides easily and it rolls smoothly on big sturdy wheels. So glad I picked this cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Avery

customer_reviews.title: It came broken
customer_reviews.text: I was excited to have found the exact product I was looking for and at a very reasonable price. Unfortunately when it arrived the handle was already broken. Even though it is cracked it still works. My concern is how long it will survive
customer_reviews.author: Amanda McMahon

customer_reviews.title: Holds ice a long time
customer_reviews.text: 3 days in the backyard in the sun and it still has ice. Has a plug to let out water. It rolls really nicely. Love it.
customer_reviews.author: Jayson R.

customer_reviews.title: Got what I paid for
customer_reviews.text: Knew what I was getting. Needed something to sit on the passenger seat when I camp. Didn't want a full size width since I'd be sliding my seat forward. Soon as i got it check it out things were fine. Put on my masking tape and drilled my wholes in the lid. Spray foam!! Lid is hollow as what. Will it hold ice for days I'll find out eventually. But I do the full jug of ice. Those hold for at least a week I know for sure. I'll be trying dry ice the first round with this.
customer_reviews.author: eric..

customer_reviews.title: Huge cooler
customer_reviews.text: This item is larger than I imagined. My own fault for not checking the actual measurements. With that said, it is a nice cooler. Rolls nice, handle locks in place. My only con about this is that if you fill this with ice and food, I would make sure it is already in your car when you fill it. It is way too heavy to lift once it is filled. It is very thin skinned, but with a bit of insulation inside or under the lid, it will do you just fine for several days.
customer_reviews.author: Amazonian

customer_reviews.title: Igloo icecube cooler
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler it has enough space for drinks or even cold foods for a family. I also like the fact that it comes with wheels and a retractable handle, set for different heights, so you dont have to be carrying it around. It also has a four inserts at the top of the lid, like for cans or bottles and a drainage spout at the bottom of the cooler to get rid of any remaining water from melted ice left in the cooler. A must buy!!! It also looks like a big icecube.
customer_reviews.author: Jose Hernandez

customer_reviews.title: You get what you pay for
customer_reviews.text: I filled it up 3/4 with frozen food to transport. In trying to get the cooler up a regular curb, I thought the handle would break. Luckily, it didn't. if you're just pulling it along, I don't think there'd be an issue. if you need to maneuver it in any way, I'd be careful. I'm a small gal so hard to just pick it up with content inside. It's a plastic bin with a cheap handle and cheap wheels. It's also incredibly cheap ($$ wise), so hard to complain too much.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy

customer_reviews.title: Overall great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Thus is just what I was looking for! Larger capacity than the cooker we had, and the sturdy handle & wheels make it so much easier than the one I had to carry! The only problem is that the lid doesn’t stay up because it bumps into the handle when fully open, so it shuts on your hands or head constantly. I put some Velcro on the lid and the handle where they meet & this solves the problem, but as a design idea they might factor this in and account for it.
customer_reviews.author: Kelly L.

customer_reviews.title: Easy to manuever.
customer_reviews.text: Bigger than I am used to using but still easy to manuever for this 61 yr old woman. I will use this for FL storm season for long power outages in my home. I store my 1 litter bottles of water in here while not using for food storage. I have 3 - 45 quart coolers too I use one of those for the beach, picnics, and concerts. I cannot use the big 100+ quart coolers many of my neighbors have as they are just much to heavy when full for me deal with. I use the big Rubbermaid weekender blue ice and frozen half gallon jugs to keep food cold plus I top them off with ice if needed.
customer_reviews.author: DLDC

customer_reviews.title: Handle does not go down after 6 months of use
customer_reviews.text: I use it once a week. It goes from my basement, into the car, then gets loaded with food while in the car. Then goes from my car to my fridge and back to the basement. The telescoping handle was extended and put back each time it was moved to the car and back to the house. After 5-6 months the handle got stuck in the partially up position and I could wiggle it to get it to go down. Now it won't go down. So that really kills the best thing about this cooler. Bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Bradley D Good

customer_reviews.title: Best purchase!
customer_reviews.text: I am so happy with this cooler! The price was good & the product was even better! I used the cooler on Friday afternoon, & Monday afternoon, it still had ice floating in it! The ice packs were not totally thawed either! It fits a lot too! (90 cans) enough for a day trip!
customer_reviews.author: G. Amico

customer_reviews.title: Great Price + Great Quality
customer_reviews.text: I have been pricing this size for quite some time and then I saw that it was on sale. I was worried that it would not be the quality that I was expecting, but it was! Yay! Large size, roller and handle, plus it has a spot at the bottom to empty the water (which I use to rinse my hands). It even has cup holders on top. It's also sturdy enough to be used as an extra seat when camping. Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.author: Emma

customer_reviews.title: Versatile Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler as I was taking a long trip and needed to keep frozen items somewhat in a cool state. I froze everything and placed them into the cooler. They were still frozen 9 hours later without any ice in the cooler. It fit easier into my somewhat small trunk and the handles allowed me to lift it out and in with ease. The extra bonus of it having wheels and an adjustable handle really made transporting a breeze. The handle is not as sturdy as I'd like but it hasn't broken yet.
customer_reviews.author: Krystal-Gayle O'Neill

customer_reviews.title: It works
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews, I got what everyone said I would: Good rolling ice chest that keeps things cold for about a day/day and a half, but the handle seems a little flimsy. This would be a five star item if Igloo put a sturdier handle on here. If the ice chest is completely full, it almost feels as if the handle is going to bend when you tilt it back to rest on it's wheels. That said, it works and rolls just fine.
customer_reviews.author: R Scott Wagman

customer_reviews.title: Good product but could be better.
customer_reviews.text: Arrived quickly and very well packaged. The cooler seems to be well made. I wish they would fit the top with some sort of foam filler instead of being hollow which will not hold the cold very well. If the top was insulated I would give it 5 stars.
customer_reviews.author: Chuck

customer_reviews.title: Only morons buy yetis
customer_reviews.text: Sure you could spend your paycheck on a yeti. Or you could just buy this and still have cold beer. It's not bear proof so if that's important to you this probably isn't going to work for you. I modified mine by drilling a small hole in the underside of the lid and filling the hollow lid with Great Stuff spray insulation. Now it keeps everything ice cold for days. Probably shouldn't sit on the lid as I've heard it could crack.
customer_reviews.author: Fire Reader

customer_reviews.title: Good product but....
customer_reviews.text: The cooler looks like during delivery it was mistreated. The size and description was to the point but I was worried when I open the box because the box was broken in one side and the cooler has many scratches also I was concern about one of the wheels because it was loose and shakes when used even so the cooler is empty. I do not think it was the company I think it was the delivery. I was thinking about returning the cooler but do not think returning the item would make much of a difference
customer_reviews.author: Jayuyamom

customer_reviews.title: Versatile design!
customer_reviews.text: I use it for shopping when I'm buying fresh meat or frozen foods. I throw in the back of the SUV and then I don't have to rush home worrying if my groceries are getting ruined. If you put the rest of your groceries (the non-perishables) in a box, you can use the cooler as a hand truck with the box of groceries on top of the cooler and then you have an easy time moving everything from the vehicle to inside the house. Haven't yet had the chance to load it up with beer and take it on a picnic... Yet...
customer_reviews.author: S. H. Costanzo

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler! Arrived quickly
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler! Arrived quickly, perfect size, and easy to maneuver with wheels and retractable handle. This is our new go-to cooler, and even my husband recently commented on how convenient it is, and how much it holds (he wanted a bigger cooler, and no wheels). We use it in the jeep, in the boat, for camping, for the beach, for baseball games, everything.
customer_reviews.author: Krissy

customer_reviews.title: Lives up to the reviews
customer_reviews.text: After reading the reviews I bought this for my trip South. I filled it with frozen food, covered with a bag of ice in a ziplock bag and headed South. Hurricane Florence has nothing on this thing. It kept my stuff cold, almost all of it frozen while sitting in 95 degree heat. When I finally unpacked it almost 24 hours later I was impressed. Very glad I brought it.
customer_reviews.author: Smartee

customer_reviews.title: Haven't used in the field yet, but seems nice for price
customer_reviews.text: Actually haven't used in the field yet, so can't comment on length of time keeping cold, etc. Mostly commenting on size and maneuverability. Like the size and cube shape. seems to wheel around well and handle seems fine. seems sturdy enough given the price. I wanted mostly for occasional trips to beach, or backyard cooler. don't foresee using for super long term storage camping or anything so should be fine. do like the cup holder top feature.
customer_reviews.author: Rich

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: This thing is SPACIOUS! We were able to fit all the food we needed in it for a weekend of camping. It’s also easy to transport with comfortable handles on the side for lifting and the extending handle and weeks for moving from place to place. The draining valve in the back is really nice for cleaning it out as well.
customer_reviews.author: Elaura

customer_reviews.title: Broke within 15 seconds.  Not happy.
customer_reviews.text: Took it out the box, tried to pull out the handle and it broke right then. Cooler was empty at the time. yes I know how telescoping handles work... I super glued it back together because I dont have time to send it back before my camping trip, but if you are buying this because you want to use the wheels and handle find something else.
customer_reviews.author: Jiwilliams79

customer_reviews.title: Holds tall bottles!!!  Wine, soda or coffee creamer!
customer_reviews.text: Big cooler, sturdy and rolls well. Tall enough for wine bottles or any 2 liter soda pop bottle. Cup holders on top were a plus. I drink cold brew coffee and travel with an ice chest always. This worked great for me. 4 stars only because it didn't keep my ice cold for a long time. 24 hours and you need to drain and add more. All said it was worth every penny. Thanks
customer_reviews.author: Esther G. Wilson

customer_reviews.title: Perfect size for us
customer_reviews.text: We needed to replace an old cooler that was cracked and leaked. It was also too large and cumbersome for our small family of 3. So I opted for this one hoping it was the right size. Got it on sale which was great! The size was just right for our needs and it is much easier to tote around camping and to the beach which is where we travel to the most. Love it and would definitely recommend it!
customer_reviews.author: MakeupartistJen22

customer_reviews.title: Great Cooler, Bad Packaging. Great Value. Replaced broken handle with the one on the old cooler.
customer_reviews.text: We bought this to replace our favorite cooler with an exact duplicate. Sun heat inside the Yukon caused the foam to expand and the lid to crack after a decade. When UPS drove off I opened the box on the porch. The handle was broken. I took the handle off the old cooler and it was a perfect fit. Happy. 5 minutes work. Glad we didn't throw the old one in the trash. Igloo, protect the handle. The old one seems fine. Box was fine. Put some foam protector on the handle. Save some bother.
customer_reviews.author: Jeff Cary

customer_reviews.title: Huge cooler with handle to maneuver
customer_reviews.text: Big cooler that we used for a long distance move and a trip to the beach. Fits a lot of stuff including beer bottles, regular bottles of juice, champagne and many other miscellaneous items (soda cans, food). The cup holders up top are also very useful. My favorite was the rolling handle which made moving this big thing easy. Be advised the wheels are large and good on most surfaces but will not roll on sand.
customer_reviews.author: JP

customer_reviews.title: Doesn’t hold ice.
customer_reviews.text: So when I bought this it was around $27 and I can see why. The ice in this cooler does not last at all. Based upon other similar brands that I have had taken camping with ice lasting for days, this one doesn’t even make it a full day. The pull handle and wheels is nice to have but when you have hot drinks, none of that matters.
customer_reviews.author: Brittany H.

customer_reviews.title: Love!
customer_reviews.text: It's big n Deep like it really nice! Wheels are plastic and holds drink on top really like jus like picture u can fit more then a box of water 24pk worth price!
customer_reviews.author: Us four xoxo

customer_reviews.title: satisfactory
customer_reviews.text: took this on a vacation to the beach recently. no complaints, kept things cold with shock packs adequately. roles well, handle is a bit flimsy feeling when extended but does the job, time will tell how the handle holds up. no leak from the drain. i will get lots of use out of this.
customer_reviews.author: D

customer_reviews.title: Don’t buy
customer_reviews.text: I returned it because the lid was broken, that lid is made of very thin material. I connect customer service, he said he will return money without tax.
customer_reviews.author: Sarah S

customer_reviews.title: Broken handle but a great item
customer_reviews.text: Ordered two. One came in a plastic bag and the other cane in a cardboard box. The cardboard box shipment came with a damaged handle. Can’t be fixed. The damaged handle limits the ability to lift and retract the handle. It still works but u have to do it manually. The cooler itself is really good igloo quality. It’s a pretty decent size. The sticker on the cooler says it holds 90 cans.
customer_reviews.author: Angela C.

customer_reviews.title: First day of use and already a crack! :(
customer_reviews.text: You know what, for the price, this is a great cooler - my only beef with it is that our first day using it, we realized there's already a crack in the lid of it. :( Super bummed about that, but it's a great size for a cooler of this kind. I just don't think it stood the travel of shipping very well.
customer_reviews.author: KLV

customer_reviews.title: Great
customer_reviews.text: I used two of these coolers to fly frozen meat home. We all know how airports treat luggage, and these flew empty, then home loaded and not one bit of trouble. Couldn't ask for more. Only down side is they weigh 11 pounds empty which limited the weight of the meat I could bring home.
customer_reviews.author: Josh T

customer_reviews.title: Really nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler and real deep. The first one I purchased the handle was broken. I contacted the seller and before I sent the broken one back they had sent a replacement that was perfect condition. It’s a really nice cooler I plan on taking it to Tennessee in September for the Shades of the Past car show.
customer_reviews.author: cody miller

customer_reviews.title: Great Size !
customer_reviews.text: We purchased these for work and they hold two cases of Costco Water with Ice. Handle is adjustable and the wheels travel well over mild terrain. They have kept water cold during a summer Golf Tournament and were easy to transport. We will be purchasing more for Job Site Conveniences next summer. This has been the best size yet.
customer_reviews.author: robin

customer_reviews.title: Nice size and rolls
customer_reviews.text: It's a great size for the sell price and seems durable enough for what I'd use it for. It's to keep my lunch and drinks cold in my car or on my school bus at work. It also has wheels which makes it easier to move around. I will not be using it for work anytime soon due to the pandemic. I think it will work well for keeping frozen foods when we go grocery shopping though.
customer_reviews.author: Stephanie Williams

customer_reviews.title: Good price for the space.
customer_reviews.text: I liked the cooler kept things insulated for hours. Also, seemed easy enough to carry around and good price. The only part I didn’t like was the opening. But, got use to it. Well, insulated. Easy to roll and carry.
customer_reviews.author: John Chory

customer_reviews.title: This can be a family picnic heirloom!!!!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this at least 15 years ago. It has been through A LOT. I tried another brand which promised 5 days ice? It couldn't compete. Love this one soooooo much I just bought a brand new one to add to my cooler family. That other imposter is about to get sent back to where it came from.
customer_reviews.author: Missy

customer_reviews.title: It Works
customer_reviews.text: No complaints especially coming from a cooler I had to physically lift to transport. Should've bought one like this with wheels a long time ago. Wheels seem like they wont last long but I take good care of all of my things and they're hanging in there. The cup holders on the lid are useful as well.
customer_reviews.author: LasandSta

customer_reviews.title: Got It for Hurricane Readness
customer_reviews.text: We only used it one time. Filled it with sodas and other items and ice. After using it all day we still had almost all the ice left over. I had trouble finding someone to take the ice off my hands. I hope it always works that well.
customer_reviews.author: GODSCowboy

customer_reviews.title: Keeps your drinks cold!!!!
customer_reviews.text: This kept our ice cold for three days. Love that it is vertical space and is different from most coolers. It was easier i think to grab a drink from it than a regular cooler. I think the vertical space kept drinks and our food products cold. Great deal. Arrived in perfect condition. Easy pulling around also.
customer_reviews.author: D.slat2015

customer_reviews.title: Excellent cooler
customer_reviews.text: Excellent cooler. Ice lasted 5 days in 90+ degrees. Easy roller. Great for parties.
customer_reviews.author: L.I. NY Prof.

customer_reviews.title: Excellent little cooler
customer_reviews.text: I took this cooler on a camping trip recently and I would highly recommend it. It was roomy enough for three days of food and drinks for one person with ice. After three days, there was still a good bit of ice left in it and my leftover food was still cold.
customer_reviews.author: Rachel

customer_reviews.title: This is a good cooler.
customer_reviews.text: I just got my cooler and it holds up well. I like having the handle and wheels to move it around. There is a plug in the bottom which is useful for draining the cooler. It hasn't leaked even when transporting it around while the plug is in it's place.
customer_reviews.author: Kay

customer_reviews.title: Good ice cooler with an easy modification
customer_reviews.text: Top is hollow. I drilled three holes and filled it with greatstuff. After that the top is much sturdier. Wheels are nice and big and makes for easy pulling even over rough terrain.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Junkie

customer_reviews.title: Cheaply made.
customer_reviews.text: We purchased this item, used it ONCE and it is now cracked in the same place as we have seen others post about. While this cooler is nice and convenient to have on wheels, it is cheaply made and disappointing to have spent money - even if it was not super expensive - for one use. Contacted the seller and amazon who advised it was over 30 days so no refund or exchange.
customer_reviews.author: Brian Dickey

customer_reviews.title: melted ice in 24 hours time
customer_reviews.text: I love the size and shape, easy to fit into any size vehicle, 60 quart square shaped, plus love the wheels on it and the extended pull up handle on it. However, to be fair, low rating due to it was unable to keep ice in it frozen even just for one night.
customer_reviews.author: S. H.

customer_reviews.title: NOT DURABLE. NOT WORTH IT.
customer_reviews.text: Highly dissapointed with the cooler. Opened the package it came in and found that it was broken. The handle came broken and it does not seem like the seller will replace the item. Not worth the money, the cooler cannot be taken anywhere with the handle broken. What a shame. Was planning to use it for going to the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Erik Lluy

customer_reviews.title: I have 2
customer_reviews.text: Wife joined marriage with one. Handle quit raising and lowering due to crud. Found a replacement easy and cheap. Bought a second and left it at mom's house for fishing trips. They both work perfect and allow you to fill and roll easily.
customer_reviews.author: J. Dowell

customer_reviews.title: Great travel cooler. Not good in sand
customer_reviews.text: Great travel cooler! Travelled from CT to FL and kept food and drinks cold. Refilled ice every 12hrs. Make sure lid in sealed properly. Not a beach cooler.You will struggle.
customer_reviews.author: Jasmine D

customer_reviews.title: A piece of junk
customer_reviews.text: Doesn’t even keep ice for 24 hours. I use the cooler to keep my extra beverages when they don’t fit in my fridge. The cooler stays inside the house with air conditioning. I put ice in there every night, and there’s barely any ice left the next night. What a piece of junk! One of my worst purchases from Amazon.
customer_reviews.author: Meiling Qi

customer_reviews.title: A Really Big Cooler
customer_reviews.text: Much larger than other cube coolers. Pay close attention to the dimensions provided especially hight. I was too focused on a 12 X 12 inch cooler that it was way higher than expected. I didn't return it as you can never have too many coolers. I already purchased another to fulfill my intended purpose.
customer_reviews.author: Kindle Customer Paul Pagliarulo

customer_reviews.title: Great buy, very happy.
customer_reviews.text: Great buy for the money. Very happy. Sturdy cooler. Built well and we load it up. Well insulated too, so it stays cold even out on the beach.
customer_reviews.author: Thomas Lederach

customer_reviews.title: This is a great cooler, we have triple digit heat where I ...
customer_reviews.text: This is a great cooler, we have triple digit heat where I live and it keeps everything cold for at least 3 days. The handles are the only thing I don't like though. It's kinda hard to get a good grip on them if you need to carry it.
customer_reviews.author: Jessica Ann

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler.  Great LARGE size.  Very happy with the purchase.
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler. Great LARGE size. Very happy with the purchase. I don't know how long it would keep things cold, but the few times we have used it so far we still had ice left and everything was nice and cold even after an overnight stay.
customer_reviews.author: Melissa S

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler for everyday party use
customer_reviews.text: Great for normal use. We have used this for a birthday party and a family Christmas party so far. It keeps everything very cold with ice of course. It’s pretty easy to pull behind you if it doesn’t have too much weight in it.
customer_reviews.author: Jennifer

customer_reviews.title: Great!
customer_reviews.text: Actually used this as a temporary hold while moving for my large aquarium fish to a new house. Held warm for a long time and was easy to drain with drainage at the bottom. Wheels made it easy to move and upstairs if you needed to like me. Didn't even hold an odor despite there being fish water in it for days. Love it!
customer_reviews.author: Anzu

customer_reviews.title: Very happy with my purchase
customer_reviews.text: I saw this same size at Costco for almost double what I paid in Amazon. I paid more attention to the price than the size so I actually haven't used it yet because it's too big for what I intended it. It will be great for many other purposes though so I kept it.
customer_reviews.author: Bluegrass Girl

customer_reviews.title: Good Cooler
customer_reviews.text: I love this cooler! It’s nice and deep, and feels sturdy! The only thing I didn’t like is when it was shipped, they literally just put it in a big box with no packaging filler to product it so it could have been damaged, but I assume that’s amazons fault. But, it’s a great cooler!
customer_reviews.author: Brody

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler, even better value!
customer_reviews.text: So far it has met lofty expectations. One 20lb bag of ice has lasted almost 6 days already and is expected to last until tomorrow. Easy to fit into the back seat of a car or back end of any SUV.
customer_reviews.author: ewholff

customer_reviews.title: Worth it!
customer_reviews.text: Awesome cooler for the price. So convenient with the wheels and the inside is pretty big. Large enough for drinks and food if you're headed to the beach or camping! Would recommend over paying the big bucks for those expensive coolers that will do the same thing.
customer_reviews.author: H&M ✔️

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: Made my friend with a yeti jealous with this cooler. It holds more...much much lighter...has wheels and handle. Friend payed $500 I paid $30. I’ll buy 15 of these before I buy a heavy small capacity yeti.
customer_reviews.author: Bigbellied1

customer_reviews.title: Side handles
customer_reviews.text: This thing is really awkward to carry. I’m an idiot. I didn’t realize it had handles on each side. The handle for the wheels feels like it might break off. Overall, it was a great buy for $28. The side handles are not very helpful either. You’re gonna have to roll it everywhere.
customer_reviews.author: Erica

customer_reviews.title: Not great quality
customer_reviews.text: The handle was broken when this was delivered to me. It also doesn’t maneuver very well. It does keep things cold and is a great size. My advice: Spend a bit more money and get a cooler that is higher quality.
customer_reviews.author: NicK

customer_reviews.title: Not durable.  Can’t sit on it.  Doesn’t keep its cool.
customer_reviews.text: This is not a sturdy cooler. It feels flimsy. For 20 dollars more you can get something way more substantial at Costco. I returned this cooler after trying to camp with it for a weekend.
customer_reviews.author: Sam

customer_reviews.title: Great buy!
customer_reviews.text: Did a great job at serving its purpose! We used this cooler to travel with my breastmilk when we moved from NJ to FL. It fits the airline travel dimensions. The handle isn’t the sturdiest but it lasted just fine. The wheels didn’t fall off during handling while it traveled. It’s not as flimsy as it may look!
customer_reviews.author: Jasmin Qyyum

customer_reviews.title: Just what I need
customer_reviews.text: I am reviewing this on visual appearnace. I haven't actually used it yet. I am prepared this year if we have another hurricane like Michael here in the panhandle of FLa. It seems very sturdy and is very easy to move about
customer_reviews.author: Busy Maga

customer_reviews.title: The handle came damaged.
customer_reviews.text: The cooler came in this enormous box that looked partially opened. I noticed on the second day the handle had a piece of plastic missing. I am deeply disappointment as now I probably have to return this enormous thing back and find a box to fit it in. I was looking forward to having a new cooler and now I don't know how durable it is after seeing this. I cannot buy one of these again seeing how weak the plastic is. Only positive note. The wheels work.
customer_reviews.author: Randy Marsh

customer_reviews.title: Cold drink please
customer_reviews.text: Ice chest are always hard to buy. I bought this for my daughter party. It held a lot and kept everything cold! Was so great! Party was yesterday and just cleaned it out still had ice in it and everything was still freezing cold!
customer_reviews.author: Morgan

customer_reviews.title: Warmth is ok.
customer_reviews.text: It seems sturdy enough but a fifth wheel should be enclosed. Durability seems ok but the wheels are not thick enough.
customer_reviews.author: 85ponyman

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!
customer_reviews.text: Great cooler!! I sanded it down and painted it for my boyfriends formal and it made a fabulous canvas. Only issue is that the collapsible handle seems kinda weak, but as of yet there have been no problems with it!
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Little disappointed
customer_reviews.text: Well we received the ice chest and the handle was cracked and broken so now I gotta go out and find a store that has an ice chest like this one before my brothers birthday. Little bummed.
customer_reviews.author: Amazon Customer

customer_reviews.title: Great Ice chest for beaches and for emergencies
customer_reviews.text: I actually had to pop this open to place fridge food in since our fridge busted and it did great with the dry ice we had! We used to have another Igloo ice chest and it worked just as well as this one. Get one now! :>
customer_reviews.author: Sarah

customer_reviews.title: GOT THIS FOR A TO GO BAG
customer_reviews.text: HAVE NOT TESTED DURABILITY OF WHEELS AND HANDEL AS THERE WAS SOME SPECULATION ON IT, BUT LOOKS LIKE IT WILL KEEP THINGS COLD
customer_reviews.author: resident 818

customer_reviews.title: Decent cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought two of these to use for gatherings. I'm generally happy and they insulate pretty well (check out Yeti's if you want *really* great insulation...those are seriously amazing, but *much* more expensive). I bought this boxy design because I thought that it would better accommodate all of the beverages, but I feel like I can't put in as much as I expected. I think that next time I'd buy a more rectangular one, which are also generally more stable while rolling too.
customer_reviews.author: Scott

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler
customer_reviews.text: I bought this cooler as a lightening deal. I was skeptical but we’ve had it almost a month and love it. It came as described and for the price I almost wish I could have bought 2.
customer_reviews.author: Mandy B.

customer_reviews.title: Handle/Latch mechanism broken
customer_reviews.text: I just received the cooler but the handle/latch mechanism is broken. Because of this it's impossible to get the handle to extend. Amazon will only let me return rather than exchange it. Sucks because I needed this before going on vacation. Guess I'll just have to go to Walmart.
customer_reviews.author: Bryan Roman

customer_reviews.title: Two Stars
customer_reviews.text: Despite plenty of ice, does not keep cold very long and ice melts quickly
customer_reviews.author: Robertson15

customer_reviews.title: bigger than expected
customer_reviews.text: I was expecting this to be a little smaller but was pleasantly surprised by the size and durability. you need this cooler! you dont need a yeti if you are travelling for a few days. only if you are in the middle of nowhere for a week. otherwise. save your money and give it here!
customer_reviews.author: Trevor Hawkins

customer_reviews.title: Nice cooler
customer_reviews.text: I have been living without a refrigerator while waiting for a replacement ( two months 😡) This has been a lifesaver. Good cooler- keeps things cold. My ONLY problem is that the lid is a bit hard to open.
customer_reviews.author: suze.

customer_reviews.title: Broken after first use
customer_reviews.text: I wanted to love this cooler but it broke after one use. The handle now needs the help of a hammer to push down properly....cheap quality.
customer_reviews.author: Renee Peterson

customer_reviews.title: Happy!
customer_reviews.text: Just what we need to take sandwiches and drinks to the beach... the flat top is our “table”. Happy!
customer_reviews.author: CJFox

customer_reviews.title: Hold the ice very well
customer_reviews.text: Bought this to replace an older Coleman cooler. What a difference. Even after 2+ days, the ice was least 60% solid. Much better than the Coleman roller cooler where the ice melted in a day.
customer_reviews.author: rbfram30

customer_reviews.title: Very nice!
customer_reviews.text: Took this camping with us. Did a very nice job keeping our food and drinks cold with ice. We went camping for 5 days and we only had to add ice once. Draining and cleaning the cooler was easy.
customer_reviews.author: Berudandi

customer_reviews.title: Keeping it cool
customer_reviews.text: I ordered the 68 quart and received the 90 but no complaints.. Not good for the beach and it won’t roll the tires are to close to the bottom, but works great everywhere else..
customer_reviews.author: Steph0215

customer_reviews.title: Save Your Back!
customer_reviews.text: I bought this to eliminate having to lift a full , heavy cooler . I fill it and roll it to where I need and my back is very happy ! lots of room @ a great prce too
customer_reviews.author: beachgirl

customer_reviews.title: Don’t sit on lid.
customer_reviews.text: I had intended to use this on our pontoon boat for cooling and additional seating while at anchor. I failed to see the little picture that says do not sit on lid. My error. Yet, an improvement would be to provide a sturdier lid.
customer_reviews.author: R. Pietrykowski

customer_reviews.title: great buy
customer_reviews.text: This Igloo cooler kept our food/drinks cold for over 2 days in a mid 70's condition without changing the ice!! The rollers and handle are sturdy and very easy to pull. WOW this sure beats lifting a heavy cooler. I would highly recommend the fitting basket to get easier to the bottom of the cooler.
customer_reviews.author: MIKE ROWAN

customer_reviews.title: Great for large quantities and room for ice!
customer_reviews.text: Cooler keeps things cold with the tight fitting lid. It just barely held a Pyrex 9x11 baking dish with handles. That was one reason I got the cooler. The wheels are good for most surfaces. It will not go up or down stairs unless it is in your arms! It was a great buy at $24.99.
customer_reviews.author: BobW

customer_reviews.title: Great value
customer_reviews.text: We used this cooler on a very hot weekend camping trip. It had more than enough space for all the food we needed to keep chilled. We dumped 20lbs of ice in on a Friday and a lot of it was still solid by Sunday afternoon. A really good value given its price, performance, and size.
customer_reviews.author: gj4605

customer_reviews.title: Great cooler!!!
customer_reviews.text: Great quality product. Keeps items cold, and wheels allow easy transport. Highly recommend!!!
customer_reviews.author: SBell

customer_reviews.title: The only cooler you need
customer_reviews.text: This cooler is great!! Along handle for pulling along behind you without straining and a compact design that still has the capacity to haul a bunch of stuff. I’m probably get another because I like it so much!
customer_reviews.author: Signa

customer_reviews.title: Cannot get handle to fully extend
customer_reviews.text: We have had two of these coolers for many years and loved them, but this new one's handle is not fully extending. I will keep trying, but I don't want to break it totally either.
customer_reviews.author: Customer

customer_reviews.title: Worked great at the lake
customer_reviews.text: This worked great at the lake. Had no issues, but I also didn't try to push it to its limits. I saw some reviews saying the handle would break, so I didn't try to put stuff on top of the cooler while wheeling it around. Seems sturdy enough for appropriate use.
customer_reviews.author: Kru

product_meta.title: Igloo Ice Cube Roller Cooler (60-Quart, Ocean Blue)
feature_bullets: Ultratherm insulated body keeps cold for a long time
Push button and locking telescopic handle
Durable wheels and reinforced tow handle make transporting a full cooler easy
Molded side scoop handles for ease of loading and unloading
60 quart capacity. Exterior Dimensions ( L x W x H )-20 x 18.5 x 20.69 inches. Interior Dimensions ( L x W x H )-Top - 16.75 x 14.5 x 17.25 inches, Bottom - 15.25 x 12 x 17.25 inches

Average customer reviews has a small extra line on hover* https://omni-grok.amazon.com/xref/src/appgroup/websiteTemplates/retail/SoftlinesDetailPageAssets/udp-intl-lock/src/legacy.css?indexName=WebsiteTemplates#40*/.noUnderline a:hover {text-decoration: none;}
